column13: Brambles' digital programme leverages exclusive data to power more brilliant, sustainable supply chains. These three practical work streams demonstrate how digital innovation is helping Brambles better understand asset movements, inefficiencies, misuse and customer-linked behaviour patterns. Targeted diagnostics: 'Smart pallets' test hypotheses by gathering a wealth of data, such as geolocation, that enables us to optimise our networks. Continuous diagnostics: This initiative monitors bright pallets, randomly distributed in multiple markets, to optimise network productivity and create more value for supply chains. Serialisation+: Unique identifiers allow Brambles to track pallet flows at individual asset levels and improve network efficiencies.

column13: The CHEP USA Pallet Remanufacturing Team has implemented a new process at 57 service centres that advanced pallet repair capabilities. This process targeted pallets previously considered damaged beyond repair - when all three connector boards are damaged. This process has saved over 2.4 million pallets and helped CHEP USA avoid more than 12,408 tonnes of CO2-e, equivalent to the carbon sequestered by more than 7,200 hectares of US forests.

column6: Role of the highest governance body in overseeing the management of impacts
column7: Under the Charter, the role of the Board is to Instil and reinforce a culture throughout Brambles of behaving lawfully, ethically and responsibly, including approving a statement of values that reflects that culture; Approve the purpose, strategic objectives and risk appetite of Brambles; Review, approve and monitor the adequacy of the Group's risk management framework; Oversee executive management's (i) conduct of Brambles' affairs in achieving its strategic objectives in a manner aligned with its purpose, values and risk appetite; and (ii) instilling of Brambles' values throughout its businesses and operations.
